DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is the safety and efficacy of Buprenorphine/Naloxone in the treatment of opioid dependence. A compassionate use study.
DOC.brief_title: Buprenorphine/Naloxone in the Treatment of Heroin Dependence - 14
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to provide follow-up compassionate use treatment and evaluate long term safety and efficacy of a buprenorphine/naloxone combination tablet for opiate dependence treatment for subjects who have completed Cooperative Study 1008 A and B.
DOC.criteria: Completion of Cooperative Study 1008 A/B Significant medical or psychiatric illness. Noncompliance with study procedures in the Cooperative Study 1008 A/B
